_sText:
Alright so two years after the initial release, this awesome guy named Shadow Sheep actually made it happen. Surf_edge is finally available for the CSS and TF2 communities as well. He fixed up all the ramp models along with some other stuff and I can't thank him enough for it.
 
If you want to give him a shout-out or have any questions about anything, feel free to hit him up on Steam. http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198043160163/

All hail the Shadow Sheep.
